Question & Options:
Who composed the soundtrack and score for the movie 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh', released in 2002?
Options:
A. A. A.R. Rahman
B. B. Pritam
C. C. Vishal-Shekhar
D. D. Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy

In the movie 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' released in 2002, what was the significance of the collaboration between Santoshi and A.R. Rahman?
Options:
A. It was their first collaboration on a historical film.
B. It marked A.R. Rahman's second collaboration with Santoshi after 'Pukar'.
C. A.R. Rahman composed the soundtrack for the film exclusively.
D. Santoshi directed the music video for A.R. Rahman's song.
Correct Answer: It marked A.R. Rahman's second collaboration with Santoshi after 'Pukar'.

In the movie 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' (2002), which two songs are noted for conveying a patriotic fervour despite their subdued tone?
Options:
A. Mera Rang De Basanti and Sarfaroshi Ki Tamanna
B. Vande Mataram and Aye Mere Watan Ke Logo
C. Chak De! India and Jai Ho
D. Teri Mitti and Sandese Aate Hain
Correct Answer: Mera Rang De Basanti and Sarfaroshi Ki Tamanna

B. Sarfaroshi Ki Tamanna and Mahive Mahive

Question & Options:
In the 2002 film 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh', which two songs are noted for their intensity in both lyrics and composition?
Options:
A. sura so pahchaniye and mera rang de basanti
B. vande mataram and sarfaroshi ki tamanna
C. de dee hame aazadi and rang de basanti
D. chura liya hai tumne and kabhi kabhi mere dil mein
Correct Answer: sura so pahchaniye and mera rang de basanti

Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' (2002), which two songs were beautifully composed and received praise for their exquisite renditions?
Options:
A. A. Vande Mataram and Rang De Basanti
B. B. Pagdi Sambhal Jatta and Sarfaroshi Ki Tamanna (Duet Version)
C. C. Chale Chalo and Mera Rang De Basanti Chola
D. D. De Dee Hame Azaadi and Aye Watan Ke Logo
Correct Answer: B. Pagdi Sambhal Jatta and Sarfaroshi Ki Tamanna (Duet Version)

Question & Options:
In the movie 'The Legend of Bhagat Singh' (2002), how did A.R. Rahman compare the song 'Des Mere Des' to 'Lagaan's music'?
Options:
A. He stated they are completely different in style.
B. He mentioned they have a similar musical style.
C. He said 'Des Mere Des' is better than 'Lagaan's music'.
D. He did not comment on the music of 'Lagaan'.
Correct Answer: He mentioned they have a similar musical style.
